mention.text: the powerful mafioso who avoided jail for decades by wandering the streets in a ratty bathrobe and slippers
gigante , the powerful mafioso who avoided jail for decades by wandering the streets in a ratty bathrobe and slippers
a spokeswoman for the fbi , the organization that worked for years to put him behind bars
the `` oddfather '' for his bizarre behavior

the final act in a 50 - year career linking the era of old - time gangsters and the modern - day mafia of gotti
